alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Morgan, northern Breathitt, central Magoffin, east central Lee and central Wolfe Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lexie, or 8 miles east of Campton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Helechawa, Sellars and Keck around 450 PM EDT. Rosefork, Shockey, Lee City, Moct, Adele and Taulbee around 455 PM EDT. Burkhart, Belknap, Rock Lick and Cannel City around 500 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cutuno, Wheel Rim, Mountain Valley, Burg, Bays, Netty, Lykins, Dale, Epson, Hager, Rousseau, Eugene, Puncheon, Seiltz, Cornelia, Ova, Stella, Kernie, Bethanna, Guage, Patton, Fritz, Foraker, Gullett, Gifford, Elsie, Hendricks and Lambric. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
